name: Assault on Antares
description:
Assault on Antares is a studnet project made by students of SAE Dubai .Project team members : NOAMAN Khalil , Cameron Fernandez & Nile mcmorrow 

Known bugs & features to improve/add :

-Controls are not as smooth .

-Movemnt causes sliding of character

-Could could use more animations .

-Instructions to "Repair" are not clear

-Camera zoom feature

-Balance the turrets in the game as they are too powerful at the maximum upgrade level .

- More mouse sensitivity

- Putting a female avatar into the game
